items.text: back of a length, opens the face to backward point
full outside off, driven into the covers
back of a length, slides into the pads and clips it on the way to short fine leg
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 leg bye

items.text: full on middle, driven past the diving mid-off who half-stops and that's enough time for a brace
short of a length outside off, steered to third man

items.preText: DanielAlexander: "Asela Gunaratne had to use all his Army training for that runout."
items.text: sliding on the pads, turned away to midwicket
short of a length, angling in, pulled to deep backward square leg
back of a length, outside off, sticks the bat out and gets beaten
items.shortText: Madushanka to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: worked away to deep square leg for one
low full toss, driven to point
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: back of a length, shifts back and finds the splice to point
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: short of good length, rides the bounce and bunts it out to point
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full outside off, carved away to cover
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, clipped wide of mid-on
yorker on off, dug out to mid-on
short ball, doesn't entirely get on top but manages to time a pull well enough through square leg
advances and swings to a back of a length delivery and misses
short of good length, drops to point for one
tries to force a pull but doesn't time it too well to midwicket
items.shortText: Madushanka to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.preText: Tasmeem: "I think Mashrafe should have come to bat before both Miraz and Saifuddin. Experience is needed in this sort of situation, and they both lacked it."
items.text: that's another dismissal to a poor shot. They might just check for the no ball. Has the bowler overstepped? There just might be a small, small portion of the foot behind the line. Benefit of the doubt might go to the bowler. And yes, given. First international wicket for Madushanka. A full toss that's been swatted straight into the hands of midwicket

dismissal.text: Mashrafe Mortaza c Mendis b Madushanka 5 (12b 0x4 0x6) SR: 41.66

items.text: he's on a hat-trick on debut. What a memorable one he's having! His team is cruising to a big win and he's hastening their push. An extremely full delivery, the perfect one to the tailender. Rubel swings without getting underneath or behind it and the ball curves in to clatter the stumps
short of a length, opens the face and steers to third man
full, slanted across, no feet as he swings and misses
items.shortText: Chameera to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: leaves him extremely late from a good length and has him beaten
items.shortText: Chameera to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: pushes without feet, again jags away and beats the outside edge
items.shortText: Chameera to Mustafizur Rahman, no run
